room_title: Escape room "aXe Raiders" by AmeriEscape Room in Las Vegas
room_address: 210 E Charleston Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89104
room_description:
After centuries of being sealed away from humanity, the Tomb of Pharaoh Tanutamon may have finally been rediscovered. Any chance you may have of claiming the Golden Mask of the Pharaoh is quickly slipping away as the group of archaeologists head to their campsite and close in on the pyramid.
You claim to be the greatest tomb raider of all time, but the treasures inside the tomb may soon be outside your reach. This is your last chance! You only have one hour to locate the pyramid and open up the burial chamber before they arrive.
